## Data
This is a summary of how i got the data and transform the data.

### Data Collection
I've asked some friends to rate 6 movies on the scale of 1 to 5 and leave blank if they haven't seen the movie yet. The data was collected with Google form. Here is the [link](https://forms.gle/jiZaGEf1KMg47kKz7) to the questions on the Google form. 

### Data manipulation
After data collection, I exported the data in Google sheets and transformed the data into a csv file.
